Posts.Content: Aug 12, 2013 03:27PM Angstapp wrote: Oh wow, that's taking a long time to grow back, I start Taxotere tomorrow and am super nervous about it, I've had 3 x fec and lost all my hair on head but managed to keep eyebrows and some eyelashes, read allot of info that taxotere will make the rest fall out and loose eyebrows!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Angstapp wrote: Hi all, Just wondering if anyone on here has experienced pain in the arm from wrist to elbow on your chemo arm (those that are having a line put in), my arm is getting pretty sore after my 3rd FEC chemo, have done a bit of googling and turned up a few people experienced the same thing but would like to know if you've had this - what helped?, how long did it last? Thanks, Ange :) Dx 4/10/2013, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/19 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 5/6/2013 Lymph node removal: Right; Mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (right): Free TRAM flap Chemotherapy 6/12/2013 Ellence (epirubicin), Fluorouracil (5-fluorouracil, 5-FU, Adrucil), Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pain in chemo arm Angstapp raynaj
